channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 'We're simply not ready': REAL ID rollout could trigger national headache, state lawmaker warns
item.description: Kentucky legislators are asking the Trump administration for an extension on the federal REAL ID deadline.

item.title: Hawley reignites 'PELOSI Act' push to ban lawmakers from trading stocks
item.description: Sen. Josh Hawley, R-Mo., reintroduced his "PELOSI Act" seeking to ban lawmakers from making stock trades while they are in office on Monday.

item.title: Schumer: Not Stepping Aside for Younger Generation

item.title: Trump says 'disruptors' at GOP town hall events should be 'immediately ejected': 'Troublemakers'
item.description: President Donald Trump called on Republicans to respond to "disruptors and troublemakers" at town hall events by having them "immediately ejected."
